Articles.Content:
Hello!

Today, I want to share with everyone my first attempt at beautifying a screenshot:

![Vtqmvc6.png](http://i.imgur.com/Vtqmvc6.png)

It may look like it's just a screenshot, but I worked hard to make it seem as if it would actually be something you could take in-game -- hence why it would look like it does. I can try to make fancy lens flares and all that, but, for me, doing that causes pictures to lose their meaning :/ Anyways, hope you like it! I will be doing more, so stay tuned!

- Nintendo
Nice! I especially like the look of the sea.
